parameters.definition: Minimum total tons of candles to be transported
Fraction of total tons required to be transported by air
Minimum number of trips by freight

description: A candle-making company can move their inventory of candles using freight and air. Freight can transport \param{FreightCapacity} tons per trip while using air can transport \param{AirCapacity} tons per trip. Since freight take longer, the cost for each freight trip is \param{FreightCost} while the cost over air for each trip is \param{AirCost}. The company needs to transport at least \param{MinimumTons} tons of candles and they have a budget of \param{Budget}. Additionally, due to some urgent orders, at least \param{AirFraction} of tons of candles must be transported through air. There must also be at least \param{MinimumFreightTrips} trips through freight. How many of trip by each should be scheduled to minimize the total number of trips?
